an10.25:0.4: “Mendicants, there are these ten universal dimensions of meditation.
an10.25:0.6: Someone perceives the meditation on universal earth above, below, across, non-dual and limitless.
an10.25:0.7: They perceive the meditation on universal water …
an10.25:0.15: They perceive the meditation on universal consciousness above, below, across, non-dual and limitless.
an10.25:0.16: These are the ten universal dimensions of meditation.”
